items.q: Do Mr. Taylor and the stranger live in Hampstead?
Does Mr Taylor know his next-door neighbour?
Does Mr. Taylor live in Pond Street?
Does the stranger live in Lake Street?
Does the stranger live in Pond Street too?
Is Mr. Taylor on a ship or in an aeroplane?
items.a: Mr. Taylor is on a ship but he is not on an aeroplane.

items.q: Is the ship going to America or Australia?
items.a: The ship is going to America but the ship is not going to Australia.

items.q: Is Mr. Taylor talking to a friend or to a stranger?
items.a: Mr. Taylor is talking to a stranger but he is not talking to a friend.

items.q: Does the stranger live in London or in New York?
items.a: The stranger lives in London but he doesn't live in New York.

items.q: Do Mr. Taylor and the stranger live in Pond Street or Lake Street?
items.a: They live in Pond Street but they don't live in Lake Street.

items.q: Is the stranger's name Taylor or Bennet?
items.a: The stranger's name is Bennet but the stranger's name is not Taylor.
Mr Taylor's address is 24 Pond Street, Hampstead.
The stranger's address is 25 Pond Street, Hampstead.
